name: STOP Ransomware Encrypted File
summary: A STOP file is a file that has been encrypted by STOP ransomware , which is malware distributed by cybercriminals. It contains a file, such as a .DOCX or .PNG file, that the virus has renamed and encrypted. Some STOP files can be decrypted for free using Emsisoft Decryptor for STOP Djvu.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.
